import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Button, Table} from 'react-bootstrap' import { LinkContainer } from 'react-router-bootstrap' import Loader from '../components/Loader' import Message from '../components/Message' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listUsers } from '../actions/userActions' function UserListScreen() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const userList = useSelector(state => state.userList) const {loading, error, users} = userList useEffect(() => { dispatch(listUsers()) }, [dispatch]) return (

Users

{loading ? : error ? ({error}) : ( {users.map(user => ( ))}
ID NAME EMAIL ADMIN
{user._id} {user.name} {user.email} {user.isAdmin ? ( ) : ( )} {user._id}
) }
) } export default UserListScreen
